name: markdown-table-formatter
description: A simple markdown plugin to format tables.

markdown-table-formatter.formatOnSave.title: Format on save
markdown-table-formatter.formatOnSave.description: Format tables when document is saved?

markdown-table-formatter.autoSelectEntir.title: Auto select entire document
markdown-table-formatter.autoSelectEntir.description: Select entire document if selection is empty

markdown-table-formatter.spacePadding.title: Space padding
markdown-table-formatter.spacePadding.description: How many spaces between left and right of each column content

markdown-table-formatter.keepFirstAndLas.title: Keep first and last pipes
markdown-table-formatter.keepFirstAndLas.description: Keep first and last pipes "|" in table formatting. Tables are easier to format when pipes are kept

markdown-table-formatter.defaultTableJus.title: defaultTableJustification
markdown-table-formatter.defaultTableJus.description: Defines the default justification for tables that have only a "-" on the formatting line

markdown-table-formatter.markdownGrammar.title: markdownGrammarScopes
markdown-table-formatter.markdownGrammar.description:
File language grammar that will be considered Markdown by this package (comma-separated). 
Run "Markdown Table Formatter: Enable For Current Scope" command to add current editor grammar to this setting.

markdown-table-formatter.limitLastColumn.title: limitLastColumnPadding
markdown-table-formatter.limitLastColumn.description: Do not pad the last column to more than your editor's preferredLineLength setting.
